scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: pnpm run test:vanilla && pnpm run test:react && pnpm run test:react-ecs && pnpm run test:phaser && pnpm run test:threejs
scripts.test:phaser: dist/cli.cjs test-project --template phaser && npx shx rm -rf test-project
scripts.test:react: dist/cli.cjs test-project --template react && npx shx rm -rf test-project
scripts.test:react-ecs: dist/cli.cjs test-project --template react-ecs && npx shx rm -rf test-project
scripts.test:threejs: dist/cli.cjs test-project --template threejs && npx shx rm -rf test-project
scripts.test:vanilla: dist/cli.cjs test-project --template vanilla && npx shx rm -rf test-project
